LongDescription: <b><i>ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[R] No service between Whitehall St and 59 St, Brooklyn<br clear=left>[2] [4] [D] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service</b>Night, 11:45 PM Mon to 5 AM Tue, Mar 5 - 6<br><br>[R] service operates between <b>59 St</b>, Brooklyn and <b>95 St</b>.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>Whitehall St</b>, <b>Court St</b> and <b>Jay St-MetroTech</b>, use nearby <a href=http://web.mta.info/weekender/tileMap.html?staID=10058 target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Bowling Green</font></a> [4] and </font><a href=http://web.mta.info/weekender/tileMap.html?staID=10010 target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Borough Hall</font></a> [2] [4] Stations </font>.<br><br>For service <i>from</i> <b>Whitehall St</b>, <b>Court St</b> and <b>Jay St-MetroTech</b>, take the [N] instead.<br><br>For <b>DeKalb Av</b>, take the [D] [N]* or [Q] instead. <i> <br><br></i>For <b>Union St</b>, <b>4 Av-9 St</b>, <b>Prospect Av</b>, <b>25 St</b> and <b>36 St</b> take the [D] or [N].<br><br>For <b>45 St </b>and <b>53 St</b>, take the [N].<br><br> </font>Transfer between [2] [4] [D] [N] and [Q] trains at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.<br><br> Transfer between [N] and [R] trains at 59 St.<br><br></font><i>*Please review [N] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.<br></i><b><br>
